Eclectic Span Of Attention

February 2010

People who are really living the life are eclectic. They have their own rhythm, schedule, not constrained by external events.

Each activity on the schedule takes as much time is needed, important is to catch the flow, not to be forced to span the attention elsewhere.

This essay is about the world. With focus on values, attention, eclectic, time, flow, rhythm.
Brain Race
The Economics Of Time
